ISSUE.TITLE: [Setup] Setting Create database if not exist errors if database exists
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: `develop` ## Steps to reproduce the problem: - Create the database. - Run nop web installer - Tick 'Create Database if it doesn't exist' - Execute install ## Receive error: `Setup failed: An error occurred while creating the database: Database 'nopcommerce' already exists. Choose a different database name.` If the database does exist, this command shouldn't error. It has the capability to continue the install (if permissions are correct).
